page.title: 16RECREATION- VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The village hall,built after the war with money raised by public... subscription,has been enlarged and improved over the years.It is the centre of community life and it is probable that almost everyone in the parish uses it at some time. Weekly groups - Cubs Brownies Scouts Play Group Young Farmers Meals on Wheels Monthly groups -Original 10(social) Thursday Club(Senior citizens) W.I. Other users - Parish Council,Discos, Jumble sales,Sports clubs,Political Parties,Concerts,Choirs,Film shows,Flower Show,Weddings,Pantomime Parties,British Legion and many others Classes(Institute)Yoga,Dancing Management Committee one representative of each user group. Finance -TurnoverÂ£3,000 per year. Hiring fees and proceeds of Pantomime
